## Build image

```
docker build -t test .
```

## Run container

```
docker run -it -e  test
```

## Issue

When s6 process is initiatilzed and during cont-init.d phase it is trimming down variable length to 4096 char.

Check screenshot here - https://github.com/apratina/with-contenv-repro-env-length-issue/blob/master/screenshot-1.png
